protocol.name: P-GSE30099-1
text: ABS_CALL = indicating whether the transcript was present (P), absent (A), or marginal (M)

protocol.name: P-GSE30099-2
protocol.text: Seeds were surface sterilized with 50% Bleach and 0.1% Tween for 5 minutes and then rinsed 3 times with sterile water. Seeds were stratified at 4˚C for 2 days before being planted on media standard media. At 5 days, seedlings were transferred to sulfur deficient media for 3 hours. Sulfur deficient media is composed of 20.6 mM NH4NO3, 18.8 mM KNO3, 1.25 mM KPO4H2, 5 μM KI, 2.99 mM CaCl2, 0.1 mM H3BO3, 1 μM Na2MoO42H2O, 0.1 μM CoCl26H2O, 0.1 mM Na2EDTA2H20, 1.5 mM MgCl2, 0.1 μM CuCl2, 0.1mM FeCl2, 0.1 mM MnCl2, 0.03 mM ZnCl2, 0.05% MES, 1% sucrose, 1% agar.

protocol.name: P-GSE30099-3
protocol.text: Seedlings were grown for 5 days (described in Birnbaum et al. 2005) on 1X MS media before transfer to sulfur deficient media for 3 hours prior to protoplasting and FACS sorting

protocol.name: P-GSE30099-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted with Qiagen Rneasy micro kit according to manufacturer's instructions

protocol.name: P-GSE30099-5
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix two-cycle protocol from total RNA isolated from sorted cells

protocol.name: P-GSE30099-6
protocol.text: hybs with fragmented cRNA were preformed by Expression Analysis (Durham, NC)

protocol.name: P-GSE30099-7
protocol.text: scans were preformed by Expression Analysis (Durham, NC)

protocol.name: P-GSE30099-8
protocol.text: CHP files contain MAS 5.0 probe set summarizations using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method. The mean target intensity of each array was set to 250.
